items.name: Cheeseburger
items.description: CLassic cheesburger comes with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, mayo, pickles and kethchup. Additional toppings available.

items.name: Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Crispy chicken sandwich with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, mayo, pickles and kethchup. Additional toppings available.

items.name: Grilled Cheese
items.description: Classic griled cheese. Available with choice of soup or fruit on the side

items.name: Mac n Cheese
items.description: Macaroni with melted american, cheddar, and mozzerela cheese.

items.name: Spaghetti
items.description: Spaghetti with marinara sauce and meatballs.

items.name: Fetucini Alfredo
items.description: Fetucini with alfredo sauce and chicken.

items.name: Tomato soup
items.desription: Warm  tomato soup with basil and parmesan cheese.

items.name: Chicken noodle soup
items.description: Chicken noodle soup with carrots, celery, and egg noodles.

items.name: Caesar salad
items.description: Romaine lettuce with caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.

items.name: Garden salad
items.description: Mixed greens with tomatoes, cucumbers, and carrots.

items.name: Greek salad
items.description: Mixed greens with feta cheese, olives, and greek dressing.
